mph.beans.sessions

Interface CourseViewerFunctionalities

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BasicUserManagerInterface, ProfessorManagerRemote, StudentManagerRemote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProfessorManager, StudentManager

    interface CourseViewerFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods to get information about courses.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CourseDTO getCourseInfo(CourseIdDTO theCourseIdDTO)

    • Method Detail

      • getCourseSet

        java.util.Set<CourseIdDTO> getCourseSet()
                                        throws UserNotLoggedInException
        Returns:
        the set of courses registered into the MPH system
        Throws:
        UserNotLoggedInException - if the user is not logged in

      • getCourseSet

        java.util.Set<CourseIdDTO> getCourseSet(ProfessorIdDTO theProfessorIdDTO)
                                        throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                               UserNotLoggedInException
        Parameters:
        theProfessorIdDTO - the id of the professor holding the course
        Returns:
        the set of courses hold by the professor given as parameter
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if the argument is not valid
        UserNotLoggedInException - if the user is not logged in

      • getCourseInfo

        CourseDTO getCourseInfo(CourseIdDTO theCourseIdDTO)
                        throws InvalidArgumentException,
                               UserNotLoggedInException
        Parameters:
        theCourseIdDTO - the course id
        Returns:
        the DTO containing the information about the course given as parameter
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if the argument is not valid
        UserNotLoggedInException - if the user is not logged in
